Elita:

Elita sighed and followed Kup


Nighlight waited until her daugther=

while her voice tembled "He comes to kill=
 you..."

Nightlight told ROdimus how the help signal was picked up and how=
 
She and the other Pacificus MAximals went to help, that Windlord 
arrived=

behind the oth=
er maximals and how Jhiaxus found her inside her old 
home, and his comment=
s about the new Decepticons generation, 
mentioning too that she pretended =
to be fool in order get some time 
and let the others arrive for help her o=
r convince the decepticon 
that she was useless and then he left her alone;=
 after a brief 
pause, she mentioned that Jhiaxus asked abour Rodimus's loc=
ation and 
how his sudden kind tone started to scared her.

"Then I decided=
 to lie and denied to know where are you... Also I 
didnt tell him who was =
me... I couldn't warn you" said softly the 
femme.

In few words, Nighlight=

about the matrix. After a brief =
pause, NIghtlight narrated that 
Jhiaxus started to loose his patient and b=

tened with his

to find 
Jhiaxus.

"Then after he tought that I dont know nothing about whe=
re are 
you... He shot me... I was able to cover me with my wings... but we=

and =
kup arrived... That's all"said the femme
